# New Exoplanet Discovery

NASA scientists have announced the discovery of a new exoplanet in the
habitable zone of a nearby star system.

## Key Findings

- Located 40 light-years from Earth
- Similar size to Earth
- Potential for liquid water

## Next Steps

Further observations planned with James Webb Space Telescope.
